topic: How to refactor REST APIs using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to refactor REST APIs using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Refactoring REST APIs using FastAPI in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This explainer provides an overview of how to use FastAPI, a modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.12+.
key_points: FastAPI leverages type hints and Pydantic models for improved developer productivity
It supports OpenAPI 3.0 specifications and automatic documentation generation
FastAPI includes a powerful router system for modularization
Depends on ASGI (Async Server Gateway Interface) for asynchronous web applications
version_notes: Python 3.12+ is required for using FastAPI and its dependencies
FastAPI version 0.78.0 or higher is recommended
caveats: When using Pydantic models, ensure that all required fields are defined with appropriate data types
Correctly configure the ASGI server for deployment (e.g., Uvicorn or Hypercorn)
